views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

CCClearModulesBG Makes the Control Center Modules Clear giving Smoother Sight.

The Item is now out from the Stage of My Repository with also Improvements.

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshot below.

Tip thanks to prouser.

Testing thanks to @lorenzo_noide.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!


See larger Screenshots below..

Version 1.0.8 - Added the option to Make Yellow the Control Center Modules (Featured YellowModules Available on My Repo). Version 1.0.5
- Added the option to Make the Control Center Modules Red.
- Added Full iOS 12 Compatibility with the Unc0ver Jailbreak.
Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to Make the Control Center Modules Cyan.
- Code Improvement.
Version 1.0.3
- As Requested via Mail, added the option to Make the Control Center Modules Dark (Implementation of CCDarkModulesBG available on my Repository).
- Added the option to Make the Control Center Modules Light Gray.
Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Custom Choose the Control Center Translucent Blurred Backgrounds Values between the Modules (Thanks @prouser Patch).
Version 1.0.1
- Added the Preferences Panel with options to Configure.
- Added the option to Make Bit Clear the Modules Background (Requested on Twitter).
- Code Improvements.
